name: works_for
description: A person is employed by or affiliated with an organization (e.g., James Cooper works_for Innovatech Solutions).

name: located_at
description: An organization or event is situated at a location. NEVER reverse this: location does NOT go located_at organization (e.g., Innovatech Solutions located_at The Hague, Amsterdam Tech Conference located_at Amsterdam).

name: occurs_at
description: An event happens at a specific time. NEVER reverse this: temporal does NOT go occurs_at event (e.g., Amsterdam Tech Conference occurs_at last Thursday, discussion occurs_at October 28, 2025).

name: participates_in
description: A person takes part in an event. Extract for all attendees, speakers, and participants. If email mentions meeting someone at an event, both participate (e.g., James Cooper participates_in Amsterdam Tech Conference, Elena participates_in Amsterdam Tech Conference).

name: part_of
description: A smaller entity is a component of a larger entity of the same type (e.g., Rotterdam part_of Netherlands, Sales Department part_of Innovatech Solutions, keynote part_of Amsterdam Tech Conference).
